task.title: How to Subtract Numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find steps showing how to use the subtract feature on the JPS calculator app

prereq.p: To successfully subtract numbers, you must first understand the concept of subtraction.

taskbody.result: The subtraction result will be displayed.
taskbody.example: You want to subtract 2 from 3. The equation will appear as 3 - 2 = 3. Enter the number 3. Press the minus symbol (-). Enter 2. Then, press the equality symbol (=).The result will appear on the screen.
